gettingstarted-task-toolbar-editing-help: Show a guide on how to edit
gettingstarted-task-toolbar-no-suggested: Sorry. We couldn't find more pages to be improved at the moment. Try again in a moment or search for your own topics of interest.
gettingstarted-task-copyedit-toolbar-des: This page may have spelling or grammar errors you can fix.
gettingstarted-task-copyedit-toolbar-try: Go to a random page you can improve by copyediting
guidedtour-tour-gettingstartedtasktoolba: This page is identified by other {{SITENAME}} users as needing improvement. You don't have to be an expert in the subject to help.
These banners identify problems with this page. You don't need to fix them all, just stick with what you're comfortable doing.
Click "$1" to change content anywhere in the page.
If you want to edit a specific section, you can click on the "{{int:editsection}}" link near each section's title.
You can now edit the page contents. When you are done, click "{{int:visualeditor-toolbar-savedialog}}" to review and save your changes.
guidedtour-tour-gettingstarted-click-pre: Clicking "{{int:showpreview}}" allows you to see what the page will look like with your changes. Just don't forget to save.
guidedtour-tour-gettingstarted-click-sav: Click "{{int:savearticle}}" and your changes will be visible.
gettingstarted-cta-text: You can contribute to {{SITENAME}} in different ways
gettingstarted-lightbulb-text: Recommended based on your last edit.
gettingstarted-lightbulb-flyout-error-st: Try editing a few pages. It will help us recommend what you should edit next.
Uh oh, we're unable to show recommendations right now.
apihelp-query+gettingstartedgetpages-des: This API is for getting a list of one or more pages related to a particular GettingStarted task.
apihelp-query+gettingstartedgetpages-sum: This API is for getting a list of one or more pages related to a particular GettingStarted task.
apihelp-query+gettingstartedgetpages-par: Task name, generally either "copyedit" (copy-editing suggestions) or "morelike" (pages similar to the base page/excluded title)
Full title of a page to exclude from the list; also used as the base title for recommendations based on a given page
Requested count; will attempt to fetch this exact number, but may fetch fewer if no more are found after multiple attempts
apierror-gettingstarted-nosuggester: Could not build suggester. Use a valid <var>taskname</var> parameter, provide necessary dependencies (CirrusSearch is required for <var>morelike</var>), and include <var>excludedtitle</var> when the task requires it.
